PROJECT(se05x_ex_import_host_to_se)

FILE(
    GLOB
    ${PROJECT_NAME}_files
    *.c
    *.h
    *.rst
)

ADD_EXECUTABLE(${PROJECT_NAME} ${KSDK_STARTUP_FILE} ${${PROJECT_NAME}_files})

TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(${PROJECT_NAME} ex_common)

CREATE_BINARY(${PROJECT_NAME})
